alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 3:22PM CDT until May 06 at 8:12AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Baron Fork River at Eldon affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Baron Fork River at Eldon. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs. Grazing lands near the river become inundated. Low-lying areas near Camp Egan may experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
